refreshBeads(Bar) - Method in class it.polimi.group03.domain.Game
This method updates the status of all the affected beads once a bar has been moved, based on its coordinates.
refreshBoard() - Method in class it.polimi.group03.activity.PlayBeadMeActivity
This method shows on the screen all the beads that are still active after a move, and hides the ones that are not, and gives them the proper animation.
refreshBoard() - Method in class it.polimi.group03.domain.Game
This method sets new values for each slot in the board (column and row), it will check the intersection of the vertical bars with the horizontal ones, considering the final position (INNER-CENTRAL-OUTER) of the bars, at this point the moves has been performed.
refreshMovedBarsInRound(Player, Bar) - Method in class it.polimi.group03.engine.GameEngine
This method adds the bar moved by the player to the list of bars that have been moved in the round Game.movedBarsByOpponents It also deletes the second previous move of the user in order to store just what it requires to fulfill the game rules.
refreshNeighborhood(GameEngine) - Method in class it.polimi.group03.engine.GameBrain
This method will refresh the neighborhood matrix after each movement.
